00008 class HistGroupContainer : public HistGroupBase
00009 {

00011   HistGroupContainer(const std::string& name="HistGroupContainer");
00012   virtual ~HistGroupContainer();
00013

00015   virtual void fill(Event& pEvt);
00016   virtual void fill(const std::vector<fastjet::PseudoJet>& vJet);

00019   bool addJetPlots(HistGroupBase* pGrp,IFinalStateSelector* pSel=0);

00030   typedef std::pair<HistGroupBase*,IFinalStateSelector*> filler_t;

00034 
00035 inline bool HistGroupContainer::addEventPlots(HistGroupBase* pGrp)
00036 { _eventPlots.push_back(pGrp); return true; }
00037 
00038 inline bool HistGroupContainer::addJetPlots(HistGroupBase* pGrp, 
00039                         IFinalStateSelector* pSel)
00040 { _jetPlots.push_back(filler_t(pGrp,pSel)); }
